data.text:
@KRob55737385 @BatJordan @JamesEKHildreth @parenting_time @DrCaliff_FDA @FDACBER @P_McCulloughMD @AaronSiriSG @NIHCOVIDTxGuide @CDCFlu Dear sir 
             I am sougata Roy from India I will go to France next month but France government are not accepting covaxin for Indian travellers please take necessary action and request to French government that they are accepting covaxin for Indian travellers

@KRob55737385 @JamesEKHildreth @parenting_time @DrCaliff_FDA @FDACBER @P_McCulloughMD @AaronSiriSG @NIHCOVIDTxGuide @CDCFlu Time to approve the only universal Covid vaccine at the moment #Covaxin. Time to follow the science with the best safety record! https://t.co/JChjujmyb6

@KRob55737385 @JamesEKHildreth @DrCaliff_FDA @FDACBER @P_McCulloughMD @AaronSiriSG @NIHCOVIDTxGuide @CDCFlu @CDCDirector @DrCaliff_FDA as always, I’m very curious why #COVAXIN has sat on @US_FDA’s desk for months. Is @pfizer paying you off? I’m not one for conspiracy theories but with zero real info, the imagination will do what it does. Transparency is always the best policy.
